concept.title: Pipeline Monitoring
concept.shortdesc: When the runs a pipeline, you can view real-time statistics about the pipeline and examine a sampling of the data being processed. Monitor a pipeline to verify that the pipeline processes data as expected, to view a sample of the current data, or to create alerts.

conbody.p:
When you access the window as the runs a pipeline, the window displays the pipeline in Monitoring mode. In Monitoring mode, you can perform the following tasks:
View statistics for the pipeline and stages in the pipeline
Inspect a sampling of data as it passes between two stages and configure alerts
Review how a snapshot of data moves through the pipeline
